aforo.title: Capacity and Layout
aforo.content: Airecel offers a spacious and comfortable setting with 24 indoor tables and 24 on the outdoor terrace. Indoors can accommodate up to 80 people, perfect for family gatherings, celebrations, or intimate dinners. The terrace holds up to 50 people, surrounded by a relaxed atmosphere.

comfort.title: Climate and Comfort
comfort.content: The restaurant is fully equipped with air conditioning and heating to maintain the perfect temperature all year round. On the terrace, we provide umbrellas and fans for shade and coolness, even on the hottest days.

access.title: Accessibility
access.content: Airecel is fully adapted for people with reduced mobility. There are no steps or architectural barriers. Accessible restrooms are available for men, women, and guests with disabilities.

views.title: Views
views.content: The restaurant opens onto the Hotel Aimia's terrace, offering a pleasant outdoor dining experience with open views and a tranquil setting.

services.title: Services and Extras
services.content: We offer private parking for guests, ensuring convenience from arrival. We also have a conference room ideal for business meetings followed by lunch or dinner at the restaurant.
